requiresCommerceRank: Seasonal Commerce Rank Silver 5 or Higher

goods.name: Ocean Tear
goods.description: A formation of coral and pearl that evokes the beauty of the ocean.

goods.name: Allure Stem
goods.description: A tough, smooth stem. Most flora taken from the Forest of Temptation crumbles quickly, so rare samples like this are highly sought after.

goods.name: Abyss Crystal
goods.description: You feel like you might get sucked into the blackness of this crystal. Infusing it with mana can create many colorful effects, making this a valuable decorative piece.

goods.name: Sage Crystal
goods.description: A bottle of colorless crystals. These can be used to enhance the quality of other alchemy crystals, regardless of attributes or effects.

goods.name: River's Source
goods.description: A blue, viscous liquid. Adding this to potions will give them a little extra kick.

goods.name: Night Sky Leather
goods.description: Leather that shines in the dark. Looking into this is like looking into the night sky. Used in high quality outfits.

goods.name: Unidentified Fish
goods.description: Unidentifiable fish from the deep seas. Highly valued among collectors.

goods.name: Crystal Blade
goods.description: A long, thin, cracked blade made out of crystal. Used as a decoration, not a weapon; the longer, the better.

requiresCommerceRank: Seasonal Commerce Rank Silver 5 or Higher

goods.name: Wooden Table
goods.description: A table made with the wood of a huge tree. Enjoy its beautiful grain and uniquely pleasant aroma.

goods.name: Wooden Craft
goods.description: A figurine fashioned in the likeness of one found in the Rano region's ruins. Though not of any inherently great value, they're popular as souvenirs for those visiting the region.

goods.name: Stone Horse Statue
goods.description: A statue designed to accurately depict the dynamic appearance of the Stone Horse. Rumor has it that it'll be used to promote a jousting tournament.

goods.name: Karu Shiitake Mushroom
goods.description: A special variety of shiitake mushroom that grows only in the Karu Forest. It is said to be more delicious and nutritious than normal shiitake mushrooms.

goods.name: Shellfish Fossil
goods.description: A shellfish fossil found in the Muyu Desert area. It speaks to the memories of the distant past, when the Muyu Desert was an inland sea.

requiresCommerceRank: Seasonal Commerce Rank Silver 5 or Higher

goods.name: Fine Sand
goods.description: Sand collected from the Rupes Desert area, of a very fine and silky grain. It has many uses.

goods.name: Prison Ghost Wings
goods.description: The wings of one of the Prison Ghosts that appear in the Metus region. Often used for decoration due to their sleek appearance.

goods.name: Oasis Painting
goods.description: A framed painting of the beautiful scenery of an oasis. There seems to be ongoing demand for these artworks thanks to the exotic locale they depict.

goods.name: Cactus Flower
goods.description: Cactus flowers that will bloom for a long time without withering, even without special care. The petals can be dried and steeped to make a tea with a deep, rich fragrance.

goods.name: Giant Canine Fossil
goods.description: The fossilized canine of a huge unknown animal. Some suggest it could be a dragon's tooth, but no one can really confirm it.

requiresCommerceRank: Seasonal Commerce Rank Silver 5 or Higher

goods.name: Elvan Egg
goods.description: Perhaps the most popular food among those bathing in hot springs. Hot springs and elvan eggs go together like chocolate and mint.

goods.name: Calida Salmon
goods.description: Whether raw, smoked, or grilled, Calida salmon is delicious no matter how you eat it.

goods.name: Hot Spring Bath Bomb
goods.description: A bath bomb that creates rich foam reputed to keep your skin smooth and light. Surprisingly, its all-natural ingredients mean the bathwater is safe for the environment.

goods.name: Large Camping Tent
goods.description: A camping tent known for its great durability and reliability. With this helpful shelter, you can camp comfortably anywhere in Erinn.

goods.name: Pink Salt
goods.description: Salt produced in small quantities with strict quality control. It has almost no bitterness, and its mild, savory taste lingers in your mouth.

requiresCommerceRank: Seasonal Commerce Rank Silver 5 or Higher

goods.name: Volcanic Mud Pack
goods.description: A mud pack made of fine soil from a volcanic region. Spread this paint-like on your face to rejuvenate your skin and liven up your complexion.

goods.name: Magma Stone
goods.description: A magma stone hardened while imbued with mana, remaining warm for a very long time. When all the mana it holds is exhausted, it becomes no different from a normal stone.

goods.name: Ixion Horn
goods.description: The horn of an Ixion, a rare creature encountered in volcanic regions. It is often used as a material for expensive crafts because of its beautiful shape and the ease of working with it.

goods.name: Volcano Lizard Egg
goods.description: It is said that Volcano Lizards can be tamed if you hatch their eggs and raise them by hand. Few, however, seem to have put in the effort to try it themselves.

goods.name: Raspa Black Leopard Leather
goods.description: The leather of Black Leopards, which occasionally appear in volcanic regions, is highly valued due to the big cats' relative rarity.
